import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'll-footer', templateUrl: './footer.component.html', styleUrls: ['./footer.component.scss'] }) export class FooterComponent implements OnInit { constructor() { } ngOnInit(): void { } }

With Lieblings, we would like to offer owner-managed, small to medium-sized companies from the manufacturing industry the most modern option of consulting services. The pandemic has proven that software, digital and consulting topics also work remotely, i.e. from the home office. We specialize exclusively in working from home. We will pass on the associated cost savings to you. The resulting flexibility is an enormous advantage, especially for owner-managed companies. Every microservice that you can order at a fixed price on lieblings.com is designed so that it can be processed and delivered digitally from the home office. If you are ever dissatisfied with a result, we will grant you a 50% credit for future orders up to 30 days after delivery. Our mission is to develop digital microservices and make them available anytime - anywhere - that will help you to create a digital and attractive favorite from your life's work.

IMPRINT Conditions DATA PROTECTION
public Europe
euro EUR
